665720.name: SOULBREAKER
665720.description:
Woah, wasn't this previous called "Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating"?
You're right! Fool's Gold: Dice, Death & Dating has been rebranded to Fool's Gold: SOULBREAKER, an action-packed hack'n'slash roguelite with all your favorite characters. It adds a ton more gameplay onto what we presented in the previous demo, so we felt it was right to rename the game to better reflect this.

What is SOULBREAKER
SOULBREAKER is a D&D-inspired, humorous rogue-lite where you hack'n'slash your way through an ever-changing infected world.
Fight, befriend, smooch, or sacrifice your way through the ever-changing jungle of the Bellowing Wilds.

On your adventure you will face new monsters, find new items, and determine the fate of the jungle's inhabitants.

Features

  • A diverse cast of characters
  • Tight Hack'n'Slash Roguelite gameplay
  • Ever-changing dungeons
  • Quirky items
  • Character progression
  • Hand-drawn & animated artwork
  • Lots of humor
  • Monke
  • And more to be revealed!

For now we've left the previous Dice, Death & Dating demo linked to this app, so you can still enjoy it while we tinker on the new game!
